message.content:
cs.NE, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.SY, cs.CC

The paper proposes a mechanism for organizing neural dynamics in recurrent neural networks, which is relevant to the fields of neural networks and machine learning. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing). The paper also discusses the application of the proposed mechanism to learning, abstraction, and recognition of patterns, which are topics related to machine learning and artificial intelligence, making cs.LG (Machine Learning) and cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) likely categories as well. The paper also mentions the removal of roadblocks in the theory and applications of recurrent neural networks, which suggests that the paper may be relevant to the category of cs.SY (Systems and Control). Finally, the paper discusses the use of conceptors for filtering neural noise, which is a topic related to signal processing and control, making cs.CC (Computational Engineering, Finance, and Science) a possible category as well.
